card-l1.title: Acme Corp — Enterprise License
card-l1.description: Inbound lead from website. VP of Sales interested in 200-seat Enterprise plan. Follow up scheduled for next week.

card-l2.title: GlobalTech Inc — Platform Migration
card-l2.description: Referred by existing customer. Looking to migrate from HubSpot to Salesforce. ~$85K ARR potential.

card-l3.title: Pinnacle Health — CRM Setup
card-l3.description: Healthcare vertical. Need HIPAA-compliant CRM solution. Initial discovery call completed.

card-l4.title: StartupXYZ — Sales Cloud Starter
card-l4.description: Small team of 15. Interested in Sales Cloud starter pack. Low ACV but fast close potential.

card-q1.title: Meridian Financial — Full Suite
card-q1.description: BANT qualified. Budget: $150K. Authority: CTO + CFO. Need: unified sales & service platform. Timeline: Q1 close.

card-q2.title: NovaBuild Construction — Field Service
card-q2.description: Qualified for Field Service Lightning. 50 field reps. Demo went well, awaiting technical review.

card-q3.title: EduLearn — Marketing Cloud
card-q3.description: EdTech company. Needs marketing automation + journey builder. Champion is Head of Growth.

card-p1.title: Orion Logistics — $120K Proposal
card-p1.description: Sent SOW for Sales Cloud + Service Cloud bundle. 100 users. Awaiting legal review on their end. Follow up Feb 20.

card-p2.title: BrightRetail — Commerce Cloud
card-p2.description: E-commerce platform migration. $200K deal. Proposal includes implementation services. Competitor: Shopify Plus.

card-p3.title: Atlas Manufacturing — CPQ
card-p3.description: Configure-Price-Quote solution for complex product catalog. Sent revised proposal after feedback. $75K ARR.

card-n1.title: Zenith Media — $250K Enterprise Deal
card-n1.description: Final pricing negotiation. They want 15% discount on 3-year commitment. VP of Sales leading. Legal redlines in progress.

card-n2.title: ClearPath Insurance — Service Cloud
card-n2.description: Negotiating implementation timeline & support SLA. Deal value $95K. Verbal commitment received, pending signature.

card-c1.title: Summit Energy — Sales Cloud ($80K)
card-c1.description: 3-year deal signed. 60 users. Kickoff scheduled for March 1. CSM assigned: Sarah Chen.

card-c2.title: Velocity Motors — Pardot + Sales Cloud ($110K)
card-c2.description: Automotive dealership group. 12 locations. Signed after competitive POC vs. Microsoft Dynamics.

card-c3.title: FreshFoods Co-op — Starter Pack ($15K)
card-c3.description: Quick close. Small deal but strategic — opens door to 200+ member co-ops in their network.
